meanings.definition: Not suitable or appropriate to be worn
meanings.sent1: The dress was unwearable because it was too small for me.
meanings.sent2: The torn and dirty shirt was unwearable to the party.
meanings.sent3: I tried to wear the unwearable shoes as a joke, but they fell apart.
meanings.sent4: Her unwearable hat was like a crown of thorns, causing discomfort.
meanings.sent5: The unwearable jacket was a glaring fashion faux pas.

meanings.definition: Unable to be worn or used due to damage or poor condition
meanings.sent1: The unwearable watch had a cracked screen and stopped ticking.
meanings.sent2: The unwearable gloves had holes in the fingers from heavy use.
meanings.sent3: He tried to fix the unwearable headphones with tape, but they still didn't work.
meanings.sent4: The unwearable umbrella was a sad sight in the pouring rain.
meanings.sent5: The unwearable backpack had straps hanging loose, unable to carry anything.
